name: Київ: з ранку до світанку з Lenovo Explorer
name_original: Київ: з ранку до світанку з Lenovo Explorer
description: "Kyiv from dusk till down" is an immersive tour around the city, provided by two Kyiv-insiders. In Lenovo Explorer headset you will get the full experience and travel to 6 locations of the descent city. You  will join the rehearsals at the House of Recordings and Theatre on Podil, feel the ride on Cycletrack, you will enter one of the biggest libraries of the world — the Vernadskii National Library of Ukraine, explore the park of innovations UNIT.City and hang out on Art-Zavod Platforma. You will be guided through every location and fulfil the experience with immersive games. Explore Kyiv in VR and win prizes from Lenovo!
